official_title: A bill to modify the reversion limitation imposed on the conveyance of property to the Mountrail County Park Commission, Mountrail County, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Mountrail County Park Commission (North Dakota) to designate a portion of specified lands for cabin site leasing. Directs such Commission to reimburse the Government for the leased lands at the fair market value of such property.

titles.title: A bill to modify the reversion limitation imposed on the conveyance of property to the Mountrail County Park Commission, Mountrail County, North Dakota, and for other purposes.
